localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Say hello to Paperform V3! We’ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.
blogPost.body: Say hello to Paperform V3! We’ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.
blogPost.title: Paperform V3 - The best form builder just got better.
blogPost.author: Dean McPherson

localize.description: 跟Paperform V3打个招呼吧 我们刚刚发布了一系列新功能，使Paperform比以前更容易使用。功能包括**引导模式**、斜线命令、背景视频等。
localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是变得更好。

localize.description: 跟Paperform V3打個招呼吧 我們剛剛發佈了一系列新功能，使Paperform比以前更容易使用。功能包括**引導模式**、斜線命令、背景視頻等。
localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是變得更好。

previous.excerpt: 👋 Clubhouse has very unique image shape and we decided to make a tool for creating colorful borders. This is a weekend project which we made together with @muratcorlu 🚀 It is open source don't worry about your privacy!
previous.title: Chpic - Create a colorful ring for your profile picture on Clubhouse

localize.description: 👋 会所有非常独特的图像形状，我们决定做一个工具来创建多彩的边框。这是我们和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一个周末项目，它是开源的，不用担心你的隐私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上为你的个人档案图片设计一个彩色的戒指。

localize.description: 👋 會所有非常獨特的圖像形狀，我們決定做一個工具來創建多彩的邊框。這是我們和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一個週末項目，它是開源的，不用擔心你的隱私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上爲你的個人檔案圖片設計一個彩色的戒指。

next.excerpt: Audiblogs lets you listen to any web article in your podcast player in an Audible-like voice. Use it to "read" while you exercise, cook, do house chores, etc.
next.title: Audiblogs - Listen to any web article in your podcast player

localize.description: Audiblogs可以让你在你的播客播放器中以类似Audible的声音收听任何网络文章。在你运动、做饭、做家务等时，可以用它来 "阅读"。
localize.tagline: 在您的播客播放器中收听任何网络文章。

localize.description: Audiblogs可以讓你在你的播客播放器中以類似Audible的聲音收聽任何網絡文章。在你運動、做飯、做家務等時，可以用它來 "閱讀"。
localize.tagline: 在您的播客播放器中收聽任何網絡文章。
